trans-unit.source: The /bin directory contains scripts for running some of the tools and utilities. To customize your environment, put the directory first in your path.

seg-source.mrk: The /bin directory contains scripts for running some of the tools and utilities.
To customize your environment, put the directory first in your path.

target.mrk: The /bin directory contains scripts for running some of the tools and utilities.
To customize your environment, put the directory first in your path.

trans-unit.source: These scripts serve as examples to help you get started with these tools and utilities on any platform. However, they may require modification in order to run properly on certain platforms.

However, they may require modification in order to run properly on certain platforms.
